name: Stellar (itch) (Toster12D3)
description:
Stellar is a classical arcade game but with odd enemies, gravity traps and solid body physics. Lovely sounds included.

Try to beat your highscore, it will be hard!

Music by Candeax from newgrounds.com.

Developed by toster12d3 tiof@ya.ru 0_0

Android (and ios?) version coming soon /o/
